titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College 75th Anniversary Records, 1939-1940
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Clarke April 2007

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Material concerning fund raising, programs, and other aspects of the celebration of Vassar College's 75th Anniversary.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: Vassar college was founded in 1861 and opened its doors in 1865.
Ella McCaleb was a member of the Vassar College Class of 1878 and also served in several administrative positions at Vassar from 1885 to 1923, including Dean.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, clippings, drafts of publications, minutes, publications, press releases, and other items concerning fund raising, programs, and other aspects of the celebration of Vassar College's 75th Anniversary.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College 75th Anniversary Records, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
